content.description: The graph below shows the three types of survivorship curves over time.
content.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of an organism that displays a Type <math alttext="3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>III</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> survivorship curve, as shown in the graph above?

choices.label: The organism has a fairly constant mortality rate over time.
The organism reaches reproductive maturity after many years.
The organism produces large numbers of offspring every time it reproduces.
The organism provides constant parental care to its offspring for several years.

content.answer: The organism produces large numbers of offspring every time it reproduces.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
